lexUnit.name: petticoat.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a woman's light, loose undergarment in the form of a skirt or dress.

sentence.text: A robust girl , in a short petticoat of Kendal green … pushed the tubs and pots aside , and by that means formed a very tolerable avenue to the fire . ”

Next out of the bag came a paper nylon petticoat with many more layers of frothy rainbow-coloured net than the one Sally carefully washed in sugar water after each wearing , and then , to Sally 's delight , a saucy little white basque , boned and trimmed with lace .
` You and your Private Nobody , " said Dolly , and pulled her skirt up , saucily unveiling her white petticoat with its foamy lace and pink ribbons .
Irina , dressed in her petticoat , threw open the door of the bathroom .
Stripped down to her petticoat , she felt too tired to undress further .
“ We spread our petticoats wide , And we point our little shoes … . ”
Pouting seductively , she assumed a pose which presented her as a raving sexpot , as she alluringly slipped the flimsy straps of her silk and lace petticoat from her ivory shoulders .
She wore a black cotton frock with a very full skirt and frilly lace-edged petticoat underneath it , just showing .
She stepped closer , raising the hem of her dress to reveal thick , white petticoats above black , polished boots .
Left alone , Meredith ignored her shaking legs and managed to strip off and ease herself into the heavy waist petticoats from beside the chest .
Beneath the long lacy petticoats was a stuffed cotton body wearing a lace camisole .
A white petticoat , black stockings and white drawers lay over outer clothes .
She put on a red petticoat first , then a black dress , and a white veil over the dress .
She had done all she could -- bathed the weals , wrapped wet rags round the swollen hands , even taken off her new cotton petticoat to cover his back .
From her savings Ruth had bought new boots , stockings , a warm flannel petticoat and a gown made of Yorkshire wool .
It was the hand of a child who goes to dancing class and wears frilled petticoats with knickers to match .
Evans was arrested in piccadilly in 1908 , wearing ` lace petticoats and stays and drinking from an opened spirit bottle " .
